knownIssues.summary:
Changing a 'Managed' Platform Cache Partition (which is included in an installed Managed package)  in a Scratch Org causes the following error on:

sfdx force:source:pull

ERROR:  Entity of type 'PlatformCachePartition' named '<Partition Name>' cannot be found.

This is happening on managed partitions only, the same operation works on local partitions or unmanaged partitions.
knownIssues.title: sfdx force:source:pull throws "Entity of type 'PlatformCachePartition' named '<Partition Name>' cannot be found" on Managed Partition Changes
